# Core Rule 2 - Do not use information gained outside of in-character means
Using external applications like discord to gain an in-game advantage is not permitted.
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- Talking in VC with people, as long as it is not about the current round. - Streaming the server. - Playing on the server with friends. - Planning actions with friends.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Using VC as a means to get an in-game advantage. - Giving friends an in-game advantage without IC reasoning.
